original: @61a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @61a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: buddha sya sto tra n'a ma /
analyzed: buddha sya sto tra n'a ma /
translated: Buddhasya-stotra-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba /
translated: Praise of the Buddha

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Manjushri.

original: gang gis lhun po'i tshad las lhag pa'i dbu ni rab tu byin //
analyzed: gang gis lhun po'i tshad las lhag pa'i dbu ni rab tu byin //
translated: He who gave a head higher than Mount Meru,

original: gang gis rgyu skar bas kyang mang ba'i brgya phrag spyan rnams kyang ni btang //
analyzed: gang gis rgyu skar bas kyang mang ba'i brgya phrag spyan rnams kyang ni btang //
translated: He who gave eyes more numerous than the stars,

original: sa gzhi dang mnyam rgya mtsho lta bu'i sha dang khrag rnams kyang //
analyzed: sa gzhi dang mnyam rgya mtsho lta bu'i sha dang khrag rnams kyang //
translated: He who gave flesh and blood equal to the earth and ocean,

original: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad sangs rgyas bcom ldan rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad sangs rgyas bcom ldan rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Thus, I always pay homage to the Buddha Bhagavan who practiced such austerities.

original: g-yo zhing 'khyug 'gro'i glog 'dra'i sems ni gang gis dbang du gnas pa dang // 'jig rten gsum po mi shis rgya mtsho las ni gang gis yang dag sgrol //
analyzed: g-yo zhing 'khyug 'gro'i glog 'dra'i sems ni gang gis dbang du gnas pa dang // 'jig rten gsum po mi shis rgya mtsho las ni gang gis yang dag sgrol //
translated: He who brought under control the mind that flickers like lightning, He who liberated the three worlds from the ocean of misfortune,

original: srid 'joms bdud 'jig phyir du gang zhig slar yang srid par 'jug / de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: srid 'joms bdud 'jig phyir du gang zhig slar yang srid par 'jug / de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I constantly bow to you, O Blessed Buddha, who practices such austerities.

original: gang gis snying rje'i sdom pa'i khur bus sems can don la dgyes pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang gis snying rje'i sdom pa'i khur bus sems can don la dgyes pa'i phyir //
translated: You who, out of a sense of duty born of compassion, delight in the welfare of sentient beings,

original: lha dang lha min 'jig rten gsum po'i gtso bos mi rtog rnam par spong //
analyzed: lha dang lha min 'jig rten gsum po'i gtso bos mi rtog rnam par spong //
translated: You who are the chief of the three worlds, of gods, titans, and humans,

original: bkres sdug srog chags rnams la brtse ba mchog gnas gang zhig lus rab ster //
analyzed: bkres sdug srog chags rnams la brtse ba mchog gnas gang zhig lus rab ster //
translated: You who, out of supreme compassion, give away your body to hungry creatures,

original: de ltar dka' pa spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: de ltar dka' pa spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: I constantly bow to you, O Blessed Buddha, who practices such austerities.

original: / gang gis snying rjes 'thob pa'i sems can myur du bsgral zhing bskyab pa'i phyir //
analyzed: / gang gis snying rjes 'thob pa'i sems can myur du bsgral zhing bskyab pa'i phyir //
translated: You who, out of compassion, quickly liberate and protect sentient beings,

original: gang zhig phyugs dang nya dang ri dags 'gro bar dgon pa'i nang du gnas //
analyzed: gang zhig phyugs dang nya dang ri dags 'gro bar dgon pa'i nang du gnas //
translated: You who, in the form of an animal, a fish, or a deer, live in the forest,

original: yun ring ngal dang dub pa bzod cing lus rnams kyang ni kun du gtong //
analyzed: yun ring ngal dang dub pa bzod cing lus rnams kyang ni kun du gtong //
translated: You who endure long fatigue and give away your body,

original: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag @61b tu phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag @61b tu phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I constantly pay homage to the Blessed Buddha, who practiced such austerities.

original: gang zhig sems can mang po'i lus kyi nad la sman gyi phyir du ni //
analyzed: gang zhig sems can mang po'i lus kyi nad la sman gyi phyir du ni //
translated: For the sake of medicine for the bodily illnesses of many beings,

original: 'gro la byams pa'am snying rje'i dbang gis mchog tu mu ge'i dgon pa ru //
analyzed: 'gro la byams pa'am snying rje'i dbang gis mchog tu mu ge'i dgon pa ru //
translated: in a time of famine, out of love and compassion for the world,

original: nags tshal rnams su glang chen lus rnyed gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel la sbyor //
analyzed: nags tshal rnams su glang chen lus rnyed gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel la sbyor //
translated: in the forest, he became an elephant, his body dedicated to relieving the suffering of others.

original: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I constantly pay homage to the Blessed Buddha, who practiced such austerities.

original: mu ge'i zug rngu zug pa'i dus su dbu la skyes pa'i rin po che //
analyzed: mu ge'i zug rngu zug pa'i dus su dbu la skyes pa'i rin po che //
translated: In a time of famine, he cut off the jewel growing on his head

original: bcad nas byin pas bram ze dang ni mi bdag la sogs gnas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bcad nas byin pas bram ze dang ni mi bdag la sogs gnas pa'i phyir //
translated: and gave it away, so that brahmins, lords, and others could dwell there.

original: kun du de bzhin thugs kyi byid pa sla bas thams cad sems can don //
analyzed: kun du de bzhin thugs kyi byid pa sla bas thams cad sems can don //
translated: In the same way, his mind is always dedicated to the welfare of all beings.

original: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I constantly pay homage to the Blessed Buddha, who practiced such austerities.

original: nags rnams so sor gnas mdzad rmi lam bzang pos yang dag smra ba thob //
analyzed: nags rnams so sor gnas mdzad rmi lam bzang pos yang dag smra ba thob //
translated: You dwelt in the forest, and with a good dream, you attained the right speech.

original: ma dang rgyal po pha rol phan pa spyod pa rnams kyi seng ge'i khrir //
analyzed: ma dang rgyal po pha rol phan pa spyod pa rnams kyi seng ge'i khrir //
translated: On the lion throne of your mother and your father, the king, who acted for the benefit of others,

original: gnyis 'thung mche ba drug par 'khrungs te 'gro ba gang phyir chos rnams kun //
analyzed: gnyis 'thung mche ba drug par 'khrungs te 'gro ba gang phyir chos rnams kun //
translated: you were born as a six-tusked elephant, and for the sake of beings, you gave away

original: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: all your limbs. I constantly pay homage to the Blessed Buddha, who acted in such difficult ways.üîΩYou are the nature of generosity, discipline, patience, and diligence, concentration and wisdom,

original: sbyin dang tshul khrims yon tan bzod pa'i rang bzhin stobs brtson bsam gtan dang // shes rab rab gsung mtshungs par spong ba'i byams dang snying rje'i yon tan gyis //
analyzed: sbyin dang tshul khrims yon tan bzod pa'i rang bzhin stobs brtson bsam gtan dang // shes rab rab gsung mtshungs par spong ba'i byams dang snying rje'i yon tan gyis //
translated: and you are the one who has abandoned the faults of speech, and has the qualities of love and compassion.

original: 'brog dgon gnas pa'i 'gro ba 'dren pa'i ded dpon thob cing yang dag rtogs //
analyzed: 'brog dgon gnas pa'i 'gro ba 'dren pa'i ded dpon thob cing yang dag rtogs //
translated: You have become the guide, the caravan leader, for the beings who dwell in the wilderness of cyclic existence, and you have attained perfect realization.

original: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I constantly pay homage to the Blessed Buddha, who acted in such difficult ways.

original: 'phags ma nor rgyun mas mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma nor rgyun mas mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise of the Buddha composed by ƒÄryadhana≈õrƒ´ is complete.
